document.full_text: greek prime minister george papandreou discussed new emergency measures with his cabinet on monday to cut the deficit, keen to convince lenders athens can deal with a debt crisis without a restructuring.
document.title: greece discusses fiscal plan, lenders' pressure up
lines_and_colors: greek prime minister george papandreou discussed new emergency measures with his cabinet on monday to cut the deficit, keen to convince lenders athens can deal with a debt crisis without a restructuring.
